## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G03910](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G03910)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GDH3</u>
- **Gene Name:** glutamate dehydrogenase 3
- **Description:**   glutamate dehydrogenase 3;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2079364
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
